thread.title: Danielle Jones
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Danielle Jones

author: Danielle Jones
title: Danielle Jones
text: My husband was the person that got me hooked on frames direct. I really didn't used to care for glasses until I started looking online and the when I made my first purchase everything was super from talking to a CSR to purchasing online down to the delivery. I can't write enough good things about FD they are awesome. The hardest thing was choosing frames and only cause there's to many to choose from. I will continue to buy from FD.
